title: I am worried about Drones
body:
They are becoming pretty cheap and people with creative minds can do so much with them, the very fact that Amazon has it for sale for $1500 and some can be a couple hundred dollars raises a lot of red flags :(

Hell I don't even want to go on airplanes anymore I would rather take a boat, train, or car if I had to travel.

It looks like a giant zit or boil is about to pop into our lives and it will be messy.

1984, its a coming
